Headline: Howard-bound Yellow Line Service Delayed at Dempster-Skokie
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Yellow Line trains are still standing at Dempster-Skokie due to track switching problems.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Yellow Line trains are still standing at Dempster-Skokie due to track switching problems.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include:

  • #97 Skokie buses

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
